column5: JP Bushey got me in touch with Ray Kethledge several years ago and we've been staying in touch.  Recently Ray has been confirmed to the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit that includes Kentucky, Michigan, Ohio and Tennessee.  Congratulations RayK.
Thanks for the heads up Connie. It's nice to see people succeed.
Now wait a minute JP got you what???  RayK must like to fish,...  only way JP would want to pass along a judge.

Wow, that's good stuff.   If I ever argue before him, I'm thinkin' I should wear my OFC gear.   Maybe I need to have some OFC ties made.  That's a tremendous accomplishment.  I have a friend on the 3rd Circuit.
